purpose: Provide access to the latest research and code in acoustics, speech, and signal processing from ICASSP 2023-2024.
principle: Aggregates research papers and associated code, enabling researchers and practitioners to explore and implement cutting-edge techniques in signal processing.
reusability: Open-source repository with MIT license, allowing for adaptation and integration of research code into other projects.
limitations: Primarily focused on ICASSP conference papers; may not cover broader or non-conference-related advancements.
name: ICASSP-2023-24-Papers
description: ICASSP 2023-2024 Papers: A complete collection of influential and exciting research papers from the ICASSP 2023-24 conferences. Explore the latest advancements in acoustics, speech and signal processing. Code included. Star the repository to support the advancement of audio and signal processing!
highlight: Comprehensive collection of ICASSP 2023-2024 research papers with accompanying code for practical exploration.
